util.disjointset

Interface DisjointSet

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OptimalUnionFind

    public interface DisjointSet
    Represents a disjoint set data structure.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int distinct()
      Returns the number of distinct sets.
      int find(int i)
      Returns a representative member of the set that i is part of.
      int size()
      Returns the number of elements.
      void union(int i, int j)
      Unions the two sets specified by i and j.

    • Method Detail

      • distinct

        int distinct()
        Returns the number of distinct sets.
        Returns:
        the number of distinct sets

      • size

        int size()
        Returns the number of elements.
        Returns:
        the number of elements

      • find

        int find(int i)
        Returns a representative member of the set that i is part of. This representative member is the same for all members of the same set.
        Parameters:
        i - specifies the set of which we want to find the representative member
        Returns:
        returns the representative member of the set that i is part of

      • union

        void union(int i,
           int j)
        Unions the two sets specified by i and j. All elements in the sets of i and j will be represented by the same element.
        Parameters:
        i - member of the first set
        j - member of the second set
